detailed_description: A Python package for generating, analyzing, and visualizing air parcel trajectories using the HYSPLIT model, facilitating atmospheric transport and dispersion studies.

name: mdentropy
one_line_profile: Entropy analysis of correlated motions in MD trajectories
detailed_description: A Python library to analyze correlated motions in molecular dynamics trajectories and estimate entropy, useful for understanding conformational thermodynamics.

name: SML_CV
one_line_profile: Supervised machine learning for collective variable construction
detailed_description: A toolkit using supervised machine learning techniques to construct collective variables (CVs) for accelerated sampling in molecular dynamics simulations.

name: tf_metadynamics
one_line_profile: Neural networks for enhanced sampling in biophysics
detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based implementation for using neural networks to perform enhanced sampling (metadynamics) in computational biophysics simulations.

name: flutterpy
one_line_profile: Evaluation of wind-induced flutter effects in structures
detailed_description: A Python package for post-processing wind tunnel tests or computational simulations to evaluate wind-induced flutter effects and obtain flutter derivatives for structural engineering.

name: RAMAplot
one_line_profile: Ramachandran plot generator for structures and trajectories
detailed_description: A tool to generate Ramachandran plots for single PDB structures and heatmaps for MD trajectories, aiding in the validation of protein backbone conformations.

name: Stmol
one_line_profile: Streamlit component for molecular rendering
detailed_description: A Streamlit component that integrates py3Dmol to render molecular structures within Streamlit web applications, facilitating the creation of interactive scientific dashboards.

name: mdsrv
one_line_profile: Server for streaming MD trajectories
detailed_description: A web server designed to stream molecular dynamics trajectories to client-side viewers, enabling remote visualization of large simulation datasets.

name: nglview
one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization
detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that enables interactive viewing of molecular structures and trajectories directly within Jupyter notebooks, using the NGL WebGL library.

name: fluent-automation-tool
one_line_profile: Automation tool for Ansys Fluent simulations
detailed_description: A Python-based automation tool for Ansys Fluent CFD simulations, handling geometry import, meshing, solver setup, and post-processing workflows.

name: ost_pymodules
one_line_profile: Modules for OpenStructure-based molecular analysis
detailed_description: A collection of Python modules for advanced analysis of molecular structures and MD trajectories, built upon the OpenStructure software framework.

name: relax
one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics analysis by NMR data
detailed_description: A software package for the analysis of molecular dynamics using experimental NMR data, specifically for studying protein dynamics and relaxation.

name: OVITO_python_modifier_db
one_line_profile: Collection of Python modifiers for OVITO
detailed_description: A database of Python script modifiers for the OVITO visualization and analysis software, extending its capabilities for atomistic simulation data.

name: VMD-SWTTV
one_line_profile: Signal denoising using Variational Mode Decomposition and Wavelets
detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of a denoising framework combining Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) and Stationary Wavelet Transform (SWT) for 1D signal processing.

name: modtox
one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing MD trajectories in toxicology
detailed_description: An in silico platform designed to analyze molecular dynamics trajectories using various metrics, clustering, and machine learning techniques, with a focus on toxicology applications.

name: IQmol
one_line_profile: Molecular editor and visualization package
detailed_description: An open-source molecular editor and visualization package that allows users to build molecules, set up quantum chemistry calculations (e.g., Q-Chem), and analyze results.

name: NGLVieweR
one_line_profile: R package for molecular visualization
detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the NGL.js library, allowing for the visualization and interaction with PDB and structural files within R and Shiny applications.

name: shinyNGLVieweR
one_line_profile: Shiny UI for NGLVieweR
detailed_description: A Shiny application providing a user interface for the NGLVieweR package, simplifying the visualization of molecular structures for R users.

name: nanoreactor_processing
one_line_profile: Post-processing for nanoreactor simulations
detailed_description: Code for post-processing computational nanoreactor simulations, likely involving the analysis of reaction networks and molecular dynamics within confined spaces.

name: analyze-md
one_line_profile: Scripts for computing physical properties from MD
detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts for computing various physical properties and performing statistical analysis on trajectories from molecular dynamics simulations.

name: openmm-plumed
one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for PLUMED integration
detailed_description: A plugin that interfaces OpenMM with the PLUMED library, enabling enhanced sampling and free energy calculations within OpenMM simulations.

name: DockingPie
one_line_profile: Consensus docking plugin for PyMOL
detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that facilitates consensus docking analysis, allowing users to integrate results from multiple docking programs directly within the PyMOL environment.

name: wSterimol
one_line_profile: Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol parameter generator
detailed_description: A tool to generate Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol steric parameters for conformationally flexible substituents, improving the accuracy of steric descriptors in QSAR studies.

name: mdakit_sasa
one_line_profile: Toolkit for SASA calculation in MD trajectories
detailed_description: A toolkit designed to calculate the Solvent Accessible Surface Area (SASA) of molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for analyzing protein stability and interactions.

name: AeroSandbox
one_line_profile: Aircraft design optimization and aerodynamics toolkit
detailed_description: A Python toolkit for aircraft design optimization that leverages automatic differentiation for fast computation, covering aerodynamics, propulsion, structures, and trajectory design.

name: grcarma
one_line_profile: GUI frontend for carma MD analysis software
detailed_description: A Tk-based graphical user interface for the 'carma' molecular dynamics trajectory analysis program, simplifying the usage of carma's analysis features.

name: PLUMED 2
one_line_profile: Open-source library for free energy calculations in molecular systems
detailed_description: PLUMED is an open-source library for free energy calculations in molecular systems which works together with some of the most popular molecular dynamics engines. It performs free energy calculations, analyzes trajectories, and biases simulations.

name: Polyhedral Template Matching
one_line_profile: Algorithm for structural classification in atomistic simulations
detailed_description: Implementation of the Polyhedral Template Matching (PTM) algorithm, which classifies local atomic structures in molecular dynamics simulations by matching against a set of ideal polyhedral templates (e.g., FCC, HCP, BCC, Icosahedral).

name: PyMod 3
one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence analysis and homology modeling
detailed_description: PyMod is a plugin for PyMOL that acts as an interface for various bioinformatics tools (BLAST, ClustalO, MODELLER), allowing users to perform sequence alignments and homology modeling directly within the visualization environment.

name: RDF Calculator
one_line_profile: Lightweight code to compute Radial Distribution Functions
detailed_description: A Python-based tool to calculate the Radial Distribution Function (RDF) from molecular simulation data. It serves as a standalone utility for structural analysis of liquids and amorphous solids.

name: BondPack
one_line_profile: PyMOL plugins for advanced bond visualization
detailed_description: A collection of PyMOL plugins designed to enhance the visualization of atomic bonds, providing more control over bond representation in molecular structures.

name: P2Rank
one_line_profile: Machine learning-based ligand binding site prediction tool
detailed_description: P2Rank is a standalone command-line tool that predicts ligand-binding pockets from protein structures using a random forest machine learning model. It is designed for drug discovery and structural biology applications.

name: Restraintmaker
one_line_profile: Tool for generating distance restraints for MD simulations
detailed_description: Restraintmaker is a tool (available as a PyMOL plugin or script) to automatically generate position or distance restraints for molecular dynamics simulations. It supports various selection modes and optimization algorithms to distribute restraints.

name: Tracktable
one_line_profile: Library for analysis and rendering of moving object trajectories
detailed_description: Tracktable is a C++ and Python library for the analysis and visualization of trajectory data (moving objects). While general-purpose, it is developed by Sandia National Laboratories for scientific and engineering applications involving spatiotemporal data.

name: VIAMD
one_line_profile: Visual Interactive Analysis of Molecular Dynamics
detailed_description: VIAMD is a tool for the visual interactive analysis of molecular dynamics simulations. It allows users to define and visualize properties of the system interactively, facilitating the exploration of complex MD trajectories.

name: PyMOL Open Source
one_line_profile: Molecular visualization system
detailed_description: The open-source foundation of the PyMOL molecular visualization system. It is widely used for 3D visualization of proteins, small molecules, nucleic acids, and other biomolecules, as well as for producing high-quality publication images.

name: pyMolDyn
one_line_profile: Molecule viewer with cavity computation
detailed_description: pyMolDyn is a visualization tool and library specifically designed for the analysis of cavities, channels, and pockets in molecular structures and dynamics trajectories.

name: vipster
one_line_profile: Visualization and editing of periodic molecular structure files
detailed_description: Vipster is a tool for visualizing and editing periodic molecular structures. It supports various file formats and provides features for manipulating atomic coordinates and unit cells.

name: pySW4
one_line_profile: Tools for SW4 seismic wave simulations
detailed_description: A Python package to setup, run, post-process, and visualize numerical simulations for SW4 (Seismic Waves 4th order), a code for simulating seismic wave propagation.

name: VMD_python
one_line_profile: Variational Mode Decomposition implementation
detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) algorithm, which is used for signal processing and time-series analysis to decompose a signal into band-limited intrinsic mode functions.

name: MPTRAC
one_line_profile: Massive-Parallel Trajectory Calculations model
detailed_description: MPTRAC is a Lagrangian particle dispersion model designed for the analysis of atmospheric transport processes in the free troposphere and stratosphere. It uses massive parallelism to calculate trajectories for large numbers of particles.

name: pymol_viridis
one_line_profile: Colorblind-friendly palettes for PyMOL
detailed_description: A plugin/script for PyMOL that adds perceptually uniform and colorblind-friendly colormaps (like Viridis, Magma, Plasma, Inferno) to the visualization environment.

name: PyVibMS
one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing vibrations
detailed_description: PyVibMS is a PyMOL plugin designed to visualize vibrational modes in molecules and solids. It allows users to animate and analyze vibrational data from various computational chemistry packages.

name: PSICO
one_line_profile: PyMOL Script Collection
detailed_description: PSICO (Pymol ScrIpt COllection) is a comprehensive library of Python scripts for PyMOL, extending its functionality with advanced analysis, modeling, and visualization commands.

name: OLIGAMIX
one_line_profile: Tool for tracking oligomerization states and contact networks from MD simulations
detailed_description: OLIGAMIX is a lightweight and extensible analysis tool designed to track oligomerization states and inter-chain contact networks from molecular dynamics (MD) simulation trajectories. It facilitates the characterization of molecular aggregation processes.

name: r3dmol
one_line_profile: R package for visualizing molecular data in 3D using 3Dmol.js
detailed_description: r3dmol provides an R interface to the 3Dmol.js JavaScript library, allowing users to create interactive 3D molecular visualizations directly within R environments, such as RMarkdown and Shiny applications.

name: msdanalyzer
one_line_profile: MATLAB class for Mean Square Displacement (MSD) analysis of particle trajectories
detailed_description: msdanalyzer is a MATLAB package for analyzing particle tracking data, specifically calculating Mean Square Displacement (MSD) to characterize diffusion and motion types. While widely used in biophysics, it is directly applicable to molecular dynamics trajectory analysis.

name: trident-chemwidgets
one_line_profile: Jupyter Widgets to interact with molecular datasets and visualize structures
detailed_description: trident-chemwidgets provides a set of Jupyter Widgets that allow users to interactively explore and visualize molecular datasets and chemical structures directly within Jupyter notebooks.

name: pdbcolor
one_line_profile: Tool to color PDB structures based on external parameters or sequence alignment
detailed_description: pdbcolor is a Python utility that modifies PDB files to color atoms or residues based on user-provided data (such as conservation scores or physical parameters) by manipulating the B-factor column, facilitating visualization in standard molecular viewers.

name: PyMOL-Wasm
one_line_profile: WebAssembly port of the PyMOL molecular visualization system
detailed_description: A project that ports the PyMOL molecular visualization system to WebAssembly, enabling the running of PyMOL directly in web browsers for molecular structure analysis and visualization without native installation.

name: opstool
one_line_profile: Pre/Post-processing and visualization library for OpenSeesPy
detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the pre-processing, post-processing, and visualization of finite element analysis data specifically for OpenSeesPy, aiding in structural and geotechnical engineering simulations.

name: MDToolbox
one_line_profile: MATLAB/Octave toolbox for statistical analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories
detailed_description: A toolbox for MATLAB and Octave that provides a collection of functions for the statistical analysis of molecular dynamics (MD) trajectories, including tools for free energy landscape estimation, structural clustering, and dimensionality reduction.

name: ZnH5MD
one_line_profile: High-performance interface for H5MD trajectory files
detailed_description: A Python interface for reading and writing H5MD (HDF5 for Molecular Dynamics) trajectory files, designed to provide high-performance data access for molecular dynamics analysis pipelines within the Zincware ecosystem.

name: SPaMD
one_line_profile: Scalable Parallel Materials/Molecular Design/Dynamics Studio
detailed_description: An integrated software platform for the modeling, simulation, analysis, and visualization of materials at the atomic scale, featuring scalable parallel computing capabilities for large-scale molecular dynamics.

name: ProSim
one_line_profile: Promptable closed-loop traffic simulation framework
detailed_description: A closed-loop traffic simulation framework that allows for promptable agent behaviors, designed for evaluating autonomous driving policies and traffic modeling in transportation research.

name: MultiAxis3DPrinting_ToolpathGenerator
one_line_profile: Toolpath generator for multi-axis 3D printing
detailed_description: A C++ based toolpath generation algorithm for hybrid printing on curved working surfaces, supporting multi-axis additive manufacturing processes in engineering research.

name: AutoForce
one_line_profile: Sparse Gaussian Process Potentials for atomistic simulations
detailed_description: A Python package for generating machine learning interatomic potentials using Sparse Gaussian Processes. It facilitates the creation of force fields for molecular dynamics simulations.

name: jax_fdm
one_line_profile: Auto-differentiable and hardware-accelerated force density method
detailed_description: A library for structural form-finding using the Force Density Method (FDM), implemented in JAX to enable automatic differentiation and hardware acceleration.

name: DEAL
one_line_profile: Data efficient active learning framework for machine learning potentials
detailed_description: DEAL (Data Efficient Active Learning) is a Python framework designed to optimize the training of machine learning interatomic potentials. It implements active learning strategies to select the most informative atomic configurations, minimizing the need for expensive quantum mechanical calculations during force field development.

name: psiflow
one_line_profile: Scalable workflow library for molecular simulation and ML potential generation
detailed_description: psiflow is a Python library designed for scalable molecular simulations and the automated generation of machine learning potentials. It facilitates the orchestration of quantum chemistry calculations and model training, supporting the development of robust force fields for molecular systems.

name: Uncertainpy
one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis toolbox for computational neuroscience
detailed_description: Uncertainpy is a Python toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis, tailored towards computational neuroscience models. It allows researchers to determine how parameters affect model output without requiring extensive changes to the underlying model code.

name: VisualDynamics
one_line_profile: Web platform for automating GROMACS simulations
detailed_description: A web-based platform designed to automate the setup and execution of GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations, providing a visual interface for the workflow.

name: LLM-ELN
one_line_profile: LLM-integrated Electronic Lab Notebook for materials science
detailed_description: A tool integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) with Electronic Lab Notebooks (ELNs) to enhance data management and accelerate innovation in materials science research, specifically tailored for workflows at KIT.

name: dfttk-archived
one_line_profile: Archived DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics
detailed_description: An archived version of the DFTTK package, providing density functional theory workflows based on atomate for calculating finite temperature thermodynamic properties.

name: FastMDSimulation
one_line_profile: Software for automated Molecular Dynamics simulation
detailed_description: A software package designed to automate the process of setting up and running Molecular Dynamics simulations, aiming to streamline the workflow for researchers.

name: AiiDAlab Quantum ESPRESSO
one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for running Quantum ESPRESSO workflows
detailed_description: A graphical application running on the AiiDAlab platform that simplifies the execution and analysis of Quantum ESPRESSO calculations, providing an intuitive interface for complex DFT workflows.

name: aiida-project
one_line_profile: Project management tool for AiiDA
detailed_description: A command-line tool and library for managing AiiDA projects, facilitating the organization, export, and sharing of research data and workflows.

name: aiida-restapi
one_line_profile: REST API service for AiiDA data access
detailed_description: A service that exposes AiiDA databases via a RESTful API, allowing external applications and users to query and retrieve scientific data and provenance information managed by AiiDA.

name: aiida-shell
one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for running arbitrary shell commands
detailed_description: Enables the execution of standard shell commands as AiiDA processes, allowing users to integrate simple scripts and non-plugin codes into provenance-tracked workflows easily.

name: NOMAD (Optimization)
one_line_profile: Blackbox optimization software for simulation-based problems
detailed_description: NOMAD is a C++ software for the optimization of blackbox functions, often used in engineering and scientific simulations where the objective function is expensive to evaluate and has no derivative information.

name: Signac (BioTuring)
one_line_profile: High-performance analytics package for single-cell data
detailed_description: A C++ based analytics package designed for processing and analyzing large-scale single-cell data, offering efficient data structures and algorithms for single-cell genomics.

name: Herbie
one_line_profile: Download tool for numerical weather prediction datasets
detailed_description: Herbie is a python package to download recent and archived numerical weather prediction (NWP) model output from various sources like NOMADS, AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure.

name: MDFit
one_line_profile: Automated MD workflow for protein-ligand dynamics
detailed_description: MDFit is an automated molecular dynamics simulations workflow designed for high-throughput assessment of protein-ligand dynamics, facilitating drug discovery and interaction analysis.

name: aiida-orca
one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the ORCA quantum chemistry package
detailed_description: An interface plugin connecting the ORCA quantum chemistry software with the AiiDA workflow manager, enabling automated submission and provenance tracking of ORCA calculations.

name: ASE_VASP_automation
one_line_profile: Automation scripts for VASP DFT workflows using ASE
detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts leveraging the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) to automate VASP Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, facilitating high-throughput screening and consistent simulation setups.

name: ThermalConductivity-Workflow
one_line_profile: Workflow for computing thermal conductivity via MD simulations
detailed_description: A dedicated workflow for calculating thermal conductivity of materials using both non-equilibrium (NEMD) and equilibrium (EMD) molecular dynamics simulation techniques.

name: compchem_toolkit
one_line_profile: Computational chemistry helper functions for AiiDA and VASP
detailed_description: A toolkit containing Python functions to facilitate working with AiiDA, Pymatgen, and VASP, designed to accelerate input setup and output analysis for computational chemistry.

name: CrystalNet
one_line_profile: Deep learning model for accurate prediction of material properties
detailed_description: A deep learning framework leveraging large-scale computational databases to predict material properties, specifically designed for materials science applications.

name: workflow_inference_compiler
one_line_profile: DSL for inferring CWL workflow edges with molecular dynamics support
detailed_description: A Domain Specific Language (DSL) and compiler that infers edges for Common Workflow Language (CWL) DAGs, facilitating the construction of complex workflows including molecular dynamics simulations.

name: jkitchin/vasp
one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP
detailed_description: A Python library providing an Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) compliant interface to the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP), enabling users to run and analyze DFT calculations programmatically.

name: pourbaix
one_line_profile: Pourbaix diagram generator using pymatgen
detailed_description: A Python tool for generating Pourbaix (potential-pH) diagrams using the pymatgen package, essential for understanding aqueous corrosion and electrochemical stability of materials.

name: aiida-explorer
one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA databases
detailed_description: A web-based tool for exploring AiiDA databases, allowing users to visualize and navigate the provenance graphs of computational materials science data.

name: jobflow
one_line_profile: Library for writing computational workflows
detailed_description: Jobflow is a library for writing computational workflows that is designed to be used with FireWorks or other workflow managers. It provides a clean API for defining jobs and flows.

name: materialite
one_line_profile: Microstructure modeling for materials science
detailed_description: A NASA-backed tool for streamlined microstructure modeling, facilitating the connection between materials science and mechanics.

name: Molten-Salt-Simulation-Toolkit
one_line_profile: High-throughput MD workflow for molten halide salts
detailed_description: A workflow toolkit for computing thermophysical properties and microstructure information of molten halide salts using high-throughput molecular dynamics simulations.

name: executorlib
one_line_profile: HPC execution library for pyiron workflows
detailed_description: A Python library designed to upscale functions for high-performance computing (HPC) environments, serving as a backend execution component for the pyiron workflow ecosystem.

name: ironflow
one_line_profile: Graphical user interface for pyiron workflows
detailed_description: A Jupyter-based graphical user interface for constructing, managing, and visualizing pyiron workflows in computational materials science.

name: ComBat
one_line_profile: Database of Li-S electrolyte properties
detailed_description: A database containing quantum-chemical and molecular dynamics properties for Lithium-Sulfur (Li-S) battery electrolytes.

name: Polymer-Molecular-Dynamics
one_line_profile: High-throughput polymer MD simulation workflow
detailed_description: A Python-based workflow tool to perform high-throughput molecular dynamics simulations for calculating various properties of polymers.

name: aiida_siesta_plugin
one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Siesta DFT code
detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the Siesta DFT code, enabling automated electronic structure calculations and workflows.

name: PPG
one_line_profile: Heart rate estimation from PPG signals using Subspace Decomposition and Kalman filter
detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation for estimating heart rate from Photoplethysmogram (PPG) signals. It utilizes Subspace Decomposition and Kalman smoothing techniques to process physiological signals, specifically designed for datasets like the 2015 IEEE Signal Processing Cup.

name: ChemParse
one_line_profile: Parser for quantum chemistry output files (ORCA, GPAW)
detailed_description: A Python library designed to parse output files from various quantum chemistry software packages, specifically supporting ORCA (.out) and GPAW (.txt) formats. It facilitates the extraction of structured data from computational chemistry logs.

name: crystmatch
one_line_profile: Crystal structure matching analysis for phase transitions
detailed_description: A tool for enumerating and analyzing crystal-structure matches, specifically focused on solid-solid phase transitions. It aids in understanding structural relationships and transformations in materials science.

name: vaspchg_rs
one_line_profile: Rust library to parse VASP charge density files (CHGCAR)
detailed_description: A high-performance Rust library designed to parse VASP charge density files (CHGCAR). It provides efficient I/O handling for large volumetric data generated by VASP calculations.

name: wavecar_parser
one_line_profile: C++ parser for VASP WAVECAR files
detailed_description: A C++ library for parsing VASP WAVECAR files, which contain pseudo-wavefunction data. It allows for the extraction of wavefunction coefficients and plotting of pseudo-wavefunctions.

name: Materials-Design-Ontology
one_line_profile: Ontology for the Materials Design Domain
detailed_description: An ontology defining the semantic structure and relationships for the materials design domain, facilitating data interoperability and knowledge representation in materials science.

name: Soft-Robotics-Materials-Database
one_line_profile: Database of materials for soft robotics
detailed_description: A database repository containing mechanical properties and characterization data of materials used in soft robotics applications.

name: SuperalloyDigger
one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting superalloy data from literature
detailed_description: A toolkit designed to batch download documents, locate target sentences, and automatically extract material-property-value triples from scientific literature, specifically for superalloys.

name: optimade-gateway
one_line_profile: Gateway for querying OPTIMADE APIs
detailed_description: A gateway service that allows users to query multiple OPTIMADE-compliant materials databases through a single interface, facilitating federated search.

name: optimade-python-tools
one_line_profile: Python tools for OPTIMADE API implementation
detailed_description: A library providing tools for implementing and consuming OPTIMADE (Open Databases Integration for Materials Design) APIs, including validation and data conversion.

name: matcher
one_line_profile: Chemical structure optimization analysis tool
detailed_description: A tool built around mmpdb for understanding how chemical structure optimization problems have been solved, enabling deep control over searching structure/activity relationships (SAR).

name: avogadrolibs
one_line_profile: Libraries for molecular visualization and analysis
detailed_description: A set of libraries providing 3D rendering, visualization, analysis, and data processing capabilities for computational chemistry, molecular modeling, and materials science.

name: dfttk-20210211
one_line_profile: DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics (Archived)
detailed_description: Density functional theory workflows for calculating finite temperature thermodynamics, based on atomate workflows. (Archived version).

name: VASP_XDATCAR
one_line_profile: Parser for VASP XDATCAR files
detailed_description: A Python class designed to parse VASP XDATCAR output files generated from molecular dynamics simulations.

name: ThermoParser
one_line_profile: Data analysis and visualization tool for thermoelectrics
detailed_description: A tool designed to streamline the analysis and visualization of data related to thermoelectrics and charge carrier transport in computational materials science.

name: batterydatabase
one_line_profile: Tools for auto-generating battery materials databases
detailed_description: A set of tools designed to automate the generation and management of databases specifically for battery materials.

name: SMACT
one_line_profile: Semiconducting Materials by Analogy and Chemical Theory
detailed_description: A Python package to aid materials design and informatics by applying chemical theory and analogy to identify potential semiconducting materials.

name: memetic_thin_film_py

detailed_description: Python software for designing thin-film optical structures to match target spectral properties using memetic optimization algorithms.

name: thin_film_memetic_optimization
one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for thin-film optical structure design
detailed_description: MATLAB program for designing thin-film optical structures to match target spectral properties using memetic algorithms.

name: parsevasp
one_line_profile: General-purpose parser for VASP output files
detailed_description: A Python library designed to parse various output files from the VASP code, extracting scientific data such as structures, energies, and electronic properties for downstream analysis.

name: aiidalab
one_line_profile: Core platform for AiiDAlab web-based materials science environment
detailed_description: Implements the core functionality for AiiDAlab, a web-based platform that allows researchers to access and run AiiDA workflows and applications through a Jupyter-based interface.

name: aiida-core
one_line_profile: Workflow engine for reproducible materials science simulations
detailed_description: The core AiiDA platform, an open-source workflow manager for computational science that handles provenance tracking, automation, and high-throughput calculations.

name: metis-gui
one_line_profile: GUI for X-ray diffraction data simulations and analysis
detailed_description: A modular standalone fat-client GUI designed for the simulation, analysis, and sharing of X-ray diffraction (XRD) data, facilitating materials characterization.

name: LLaMP
one_line_profile: Multi-modal RAG agent for materials informatics powered by LLMs
detailed_description: A framework that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with high-fidelity materials informatics databases (like Materials Project) to perform agentic materials design, property prediction, and data retrieval.

name: SciGlass
one_line_profile: Database containing properties of glass materials
detailed_description: A repository containing a vast set of data on the properties of glass materials, serving as a materials database.

name: MPcat
one_line_profile: Interface between Materials Project and Schrodinger API
detailed_description: An interface between the Materials Project software suite and the Schrodinger Python API, designed to allow for high-throughput execution of Jaguar and AutoTS calculations for molecular thermodynamics and kinetics.

name: p2ptrans
one_line_profile: Algorithm to match crystal structures atom-to-atom
detailed_description: An algorithm to match crystal structures atom-to-atom, useful for analyzing phase transitions or structural similarities.

name: cif-parsers

detailed_description: PDBx/mmCIF parsers implemented in Python & JavaScript, facilitating the reading and processing of crystallographic information files.

name: PDBeCIF

detailed_description: Protein Data Bank in Europe (PDBe) mmCif/CIF/STAR parser and API for handling macromolecular structure data.

name: chemml

detailed_description: ChemML is a machine learning and informatics program suite for the chemical and materials sciences, providing tools for data mining and modeling.

name: matminer
one_line_profile: Data mining library for materials science
detailed_description: Data mining for materials science, providing tools for data retrieval, feature extraction, and analysis.

name: robocrystallographer

detailed_description: A tool for automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions, converting structural data into human-readable text.

name: pymatviz

detailed_description: A toolkit for visualizations in materials informatics, providing specialized plotting functions for materials data.

name: Emap2sec

detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool designed to detect protein secondary structures (alpha helices, beta sheets, etc.) directly from electron microscopy (EM) density maps.

name: optimade-maker

detailed_description: A library to facilitate the creation of OPTIMADE-compliant APIs from various structural data formats (e.g., CIF archives), promoting data interoperability.

name: mp-api

detailed_description: The official Python client for accessing the Materials Project API, enabling programmatic retrieval of materials data, properties, and structures.

name: emmet

name: ML4SMILES

name: CIDER
one_line_profile: Chemical Dataset Comparator for analyzing and visualizing dataset overlaps
detailed_description: ChemIcal DatasEt comparatoR (CIDER) is a Python package and Jupyter Notebook workflow for comparing chemical structure datasets. It allows users to analyze dataset size, overlap, molecular descriptor distributions, and chemical space clustering using RDKit.

name: cheminformatics-microservice
one_line_profile: Microservices API for essential cheminformatics operations
detailed_description: A set of microservices designed to provide cheminformatics functionalities via API calls. It enables the integration of chemical data processing, format conversion, and descriptor calculation into distributed systems or web applications.

name: iFeatureOmega-CLI
one_line_profile: Comprehensive platform for generating biological and molecular features
detailed_description: iFeatureOmega-CLI is the command-line version of the iFeatureOmega platform. It provides extensive functionality for generating, analyzing, and visualizing over 170 types of representations for biological sequences, 3D structures, and ligands, supporting feature extraction for bioinformatics and cheminformatics.

name: cgnn
one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Neural Networks for materials property prediction
detailed_description: cgnn implements Crystal Graph Neural Networks, a deep learning framework for predicting material properties from crystal structures. It models crystals as graphs where atoms are nodes and bonds are edges, learning representations directly from the structure.

name: ScaffoldGraph
one_line_profile: Library for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and trees
detailed_description: ScaffoldGraph is an open-source cheminformatics library built on RDKit and NetworkX. It is designed for the generation, analysis, and visualization of scaffold networks and scaffold trees, aiding in the exploration of chemical space and structure-activity relationships.

name: seq2seq-fingerprint
one_line_profile: Unsupervised deep molecular embedding for drug discovery
detailed_description: Implementation of 'Seq2seq Fingerprint', an unsupervised deep learning approach to generate molecular embeddings (fingerprints). It uses sequence-to-sequence models to learn fixed-length vector representations of molecules useful for downstream drug discovery tasks.

name: ComFormer
one_line_profile: Complete and Efficient Graph Transformers for Crystal Property Prediction
detailed_description: Implementation of the ComFormer model (ICLR 2024), a graph transformer designed for crystal material property prediction. It aims to provide a complete and efficient representation of crystal structures for accurate property inference.

name: Matformer
one_line_profile: Periodic Graph Transformers for Crystal Material Property Prediction
detailed_description: Official implementation of Matformer (NeurIPS 2022), a periodic graph transformer architecture specifically designed for modeling crystal structures and predicting their properties with high accuracy.

name: molgraph
one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow
detailed_description: molgraph is a Python library for implementing Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) specifically for molecular machine learning. It is built on top of TensorFlow and Keras, providing layers and utilities to construct and train models on molecular graph data.

name: moldrug
one_line_profile: Drug-oriented optimization on the chemical space
detailed_description: moldrug is a Python package designed for the optimization of molecules in chemical space, with a focus on drug discovery. It employs genetic algorithms or other optimization strategies to evolve molecular structures towards desired properties.

name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
one_line_profile: RDKit utilities and visualization tools for Jupyter Notebooks
detailed_description: A collection of tools and helper functions to enhance the use of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks. It focuses on improving the visualization of molecules, dataframes, and chemical data analysis workflows.

name: CGCNN_Paddle

detailed_description: An implementation of the Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network (CGCNN) model using the PaddlePaddle deep learning framework. It allows for the prediction of material properties from crystal structures within the Paddle ecosystem.

name: MolPipeline

It simplifies the creation of machine learning workflows for cheminformatics by providing compatible transformers for molecular standardization, fingerprinting, and descriptor calculation.

name: AFlow
one_line_profile: Automating Agentic Workflow Generation
detailed_description: A framework for automating and optimizing the generation of agentic workflows, applicable to constructing complex AI agents for scientific tasks.

name: MP-downloader
one_line_profile: Materials Project CIF downloader
detailed_description: A utility tool using pymatgen to download CIF files in bulk from the Materials Project website.

name: inverse-molecular-design
one_line_profile: Autonomous generator of novel organic compounds
detailed_description: An autonomous generator for novel organic compounds targeting specific physicochemical properties, accelerating materials and drug discovery.

name: Chemical-Data-Download
one_line_profile: Dataset downloader for MP, OQMD, AFLOW, JARVIS
detailed_description: A collection of scripts and notebooks to download chemical datasets from major materials databases using Matminer and RESTful APIs.

name: RL-CC
one_line_profile: AI-Driven Combinatorial Chemistry for Materials Discovery
detailed_description: Implementation of materials discovery with extreme properties using Reinforcement Learning and Combinatorial Chemistry.

name: Foundry
one_line_profile: A platform and client for discovering and accessing ML-ready datasets in materials science
detailed_description: Foundry simplifies the discovery and usage of machine-learning ready datasets in materials science and chemistry. It provides a Python client to easily load structured data, facilitating the development and benchmarking of ML models in the physical sciences.

name: OPTIMADE Gateway
one_line_profile: A gateway service for querying multiple OPTIMADE materials databases
detailed_description: The OPTIMADE Gateway serves as a central entry point to query various materials databases that implement the OPTIMADE API specification. It allows users to perform federated searches across distributed repositories using a unified interface.

name: OPTIMADE Validator Action
one_line_profile: GitHub Action for validating OPTIMADE API implementations
detailed_description: A CI/CD tool that uses the validator from optimade-python-tools to verify that a materials database API implementation conforms to the OPTIMADE specification, ensuring data integrity and standard compliance.

name: PyChemia
one_line_profile: Python framework for materials discovery and data mining
detailed_description: PyChemia is a library for materials structural search, data mining, and non-ab-initio calculations. It provides tools for manipulating crystal structures, interfacing with DFT codes, and performing global structure optimization.

name: IRNet
one_line_profile: Deep residual regression framework for materials discovery
detailed_description: A general-purpose deep residual regression framework designed for materials discovery, facilitating the prediction of material properties from structural or compositional data.

name: MDN-GAN
one_line_profile: Inverse modeling framework for microstructural materials design
detailed_description: A framework combining Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) and Mixture Density Networks (MDN) for inverse modeling in microstructural materials design, enabling the generation of microstructures with desired properties.

name: EnvironmentFinder
one_line_profile: Tool for finding atomic environments in crystal structures
detailed_description: A tool designed to identify and classify local atomic environments within crystal structures, useful for structural analysis and characterization in materials science.

name: SCIGEN
one_line_profile: Generative model for quantum materials discovery with structural constraints
detailed_description: A generative model that integrates structural constraints to discover new quantum materials, specifically focusing on inverse design.

name: spinnaker_tools
one_line_profile: Build tools and firmware for the SpiNNaker neuromorphic platform
detailed_description: Contains the low-level software tools, API, and firmware (SARK, SC&MP) required to operate the SpiNNaker neuromorphic computing platform.

name: CAMD
one_line_profile: Computational Autonomy for Materials Discovery
detailed_description: Agent-based sequential learning software designed to accelerate materials discovery through autonomous experimental or computational campaigns.

name: IM2ODE
one_line_profile: Inverse Design of Materials by Multi-objective Differential Evolution
detailed_description: A software tool for the inverse design of materials using multi-objective differential evolution algorithms.

name: aiida-optimade
one_line_profile: OPTIMADE RESTful API implementation for AiiDA
detailed_description: An implementation of the OPTIMADE (Open Databases Integration for Materials Design) RESTful API specification for the AiiDA platform, enabling standardized data retrieval.

name: MatFold
one_line_profile: Standardized chemical cross-validation protocols for materials discovery models
detailed_description: A Python package designed to provide systematic insights into the performance of materials discovery models through standardized chemical cross-validation protocols, helping to evaluate model generalization.

name: StructureFinder
one_line_profile: Crystal structure finder application
detailed_description: A graphical application written in PyQt5 and Python3 for finding and organizing crystal structures, likely aiding in the management and retrieval of crystallographic data.

name: analogmat
one_line_profile: Unsupervised fingerprinting for disordered solids
detailed_description: A tool for unsupervised fingerprinting of disordered solids, enabling analogical materials discovery by identifying structural similarities.

name: MatDesINNe
one_line_profile: Inverse materials design via invertible neural networks
detailed_description: A framework for inverse materials design using Invertible Neural Networks (INNs), allowing for the generation of material structures that satisfy desired property criteria.

name: iMatGen
one_line_profile: Image-based generative model for inverse design of solid-state materials
detailed_description: A generative model that utilizes image-based representations for the inverse design of solid-state materials, facilitating the discovery of new crystal structures.

name: MateriomicTransformer
one_line_profile: Generative transformer model for materials analysis and discovery
detailed_description: A Generative Pretrained Autoregressive Transformer Graph Neural Network designed for the analysis and discovery of materials, leveraging attention mechanisms to model material properties and structures.

name: AFLOWpi
one_line_profile: Minimalist infrastructure for high-throughput materials calculations
detailed_description: AFLOWpi is a minimalist infrastructure designed to manage high-throughput density functional theory (DFT) calculations. It provides a framework for automating the generation, execution, and analysis of electronic structure calculations, specifically tailored for materials science workflows.

name: Materials Project API Client
one_line_profile: Official API client for accessing Materials Project data
detailed_description: The new API client for the Materials Project, enabling programmatic access to a vast database of computed materials properties. It allows researchers to search, retrieve, and filter materials data for analysis and machine learning applications.

name: maggma
one_line_profile: Building blocks for scientific data pipelines
detailed_description: Maggma provides a framework for building robust scientific data pipelines. It offers tools for data aggregation, transformation, and management, specifically designed to handle the complex and heterogeneous data structures found in materials science and chemistry.

name: dZiner
one_line_profile: Chemist AI Agent for Rational Inverse Design of Materials
detailed_description: dZiner is an AI agent designed for the rational inverse design of materials. It utilizes machine learning techniques to propose material structures or compositions that meet specific target properties, acting as a computational chemist assistant.

name: material-properties-interchange
one_line_profile: Database of engineering material properties with Python interface
detailed_description: A tool providing a database of engineering material properties along with a Python interface for easy access and interchange. It aims to facilitate the retrieval and use of standard material property data in engineering and scientific workflows.

name: Deep RL Inorganic
one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning framework for inverse inorganic materials design
detailed_description: A Python implementation of deep reinforcement learning algorithms specifically tailored for the inverse design of inorganic materials, as developed by the Olivetti Group. It enables the generation of material candidates with targeted properties.

name: SimSite3D
one_line_profile: 3D structure database search tool for protein-ligand binding sites
detailed_description: Software tools designed to search a database of three-dimensional structures (PDB format) to identify protein-ligand binding sites with steric and chemical similarities to a query site.

name: PyMod
one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence similarity searches and homology modeling
detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that acts as an interface for sequence similarity searches (BLAST), multiple sequence/structure alignments (Clustal, MUSCLE), and homology modeling (MODELLER).

name: RCSB Embedding Model
one_line_profile: Embedding model for macromolecular structure similarity search
detailed_description: A tool from RCSB PDB for generating embeddings to facilitate structure similarity searches in macromolecular databases.

name: aflow-api
one_line_profile: Python API wrapper for the AFLOW materials database
detailed_description: A Python API that wraps the AFLUX API language to facilitate querying and retrieving data from the AFLOW library of materials properties.

name: MatInvent
one_line_profile: Generative diffusion models with RL for inverse materials design
detailed_description: A framework for accelerating inverse materials design using generative diffusion models combined with reinforcement learning, developed by the Schwaller Group.

name: matgen
one_line_profile: Inverse materials design software for novel compound generation
detailed_description: Software for inverse materials design capable of proposing novel materials with different elemental compositions and crystal structures, supporting decision support at pre-synthetic stages.

name: mat_discover
one_line_profile: Materials discovery algorithm for exploring chemical spaces
detailed_description: A materials discovery algorithm designed to explore high-performance candidates in new chemical spaces, aiding in the identification of novel materials.

name: BLOX
one_line_profile: BoundLess Objective-free eXploration for materials discovery
detailed_description: A Python library implementing BoundLess Objective-free eXploration (BLOX) to discover out-of-trend materials with desirable properties using machine learning.

name: MDTS
one_line_profile: Materials Design using Monte Carlo Tree Search
detailed_description: A tool for materials design that employs Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) to efficiently navigate chemical space and identify candidate materials.

name: InvDesFlow
one_line_profile: Inverse design framework for high-temperature superconducting materials
detailed_description: A framework integrating generative models, stability models, and property prediction models for the inverse design of high-temperature superconducting materials.

name: Perovskite-Electronic-Structure-Feature-Python
one_line_profile: Feature extraction toolkit for perovskite electronic structures in electrocatalyst discovery
detailed_description: A Python implementation of an adaptive machine learning strategy for accelerating the discovery of perovskite electrocatalysts. It focuses on calculating and extracting electronic structure features specific to perovskite materials to support downstream machine learning predictions.

name: GAN-MDN
one_line_profile: Inverse modeling framework for microstructural materials design using GAN and MDN
detailed_description: A general framework that combines Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) and Mixture Density Networks (MDN) for inverse modeling tasks in microstructural materials design. It facilitates the generation of material microstructures with desired properties.

name: Apo2Mol
one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation via dynamic pocket-aware diffusion models
detailed_description: Apo2Mol is a generative model designed to generate 3D molecules within protein pockets. It utilizes a dynamic pocket-aware diffusion process to ensure the generated molecules fit geometrically and chemically within the target binding sites, facilitating structure-based drug design.

name: DiffAlign
one_line_profile: Equivariant graph diffusion model alignment implementation
detailed_description: DiffAlign provides the official implementation for 'Equivariant Denoisers Cannot Copy Graphs', focusing on aligning graph diffusion models. It addresses issues in graph generation where equivariant denoisers struggle to copy graphs, offering a solution for better graph generative modeling.

name: TPMS-Designer
one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for generating and analyzing TPMS-like structures
detailed_description: TPMS-Designer is an application to assist with the generation, analysis, and visualization of Triply Periodic Minimal Surfaces (TPMS) and other 3D objects. It is useful for designing porous structures for materials science and additive manufacturing.

name: Guacamol
one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for de novo molecular design
detailed_description: Guacamol is a standard benchmarking framework for generative chemistry models. It provides a suite of tasks to evaluate the performance of models in generating valid, novel, and optimized molecular structures, serving as a baseline for the field.

name: MultimodalCPF
one_line_profile: Transformer-based multimodal framework for crystal property prediction
detailed_description: MultimodalCPF is a framework that fuses crystal structure and text data to predict material properties. It uses a transformer-based architecture with modality-aware training to enhance prediction accuracy and interpretability.

name: bio-diffusion
one_line_profile: Geometry-complete diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
detailed_description: Bio-diffusion implements a Geometry-Complete Diffusion Model (GCDM) for generating and optimizing 3D molecular structures. It is designed to handle the complex geometric constraints of biomolecules for drug discovery applications.

name: Artisan-Core
one_line_profile: Computational tool for lattice structure generation
detailed_description: Artisan-Core is a computational library designed for the generation of complex lattice structures. It supports the design of metamaterials and lightweight structures for additive manufacturing.

name: 3D-MCTS
one_line_profile: Structure-based molecule generation using Monte Carlo Tree Search
detailed_description: 3D-MCTS is a general method for generating molecules based on 3D structural constraints. It combines Monte Carlo Tree Search with generative models to explore chemical space effectively.

name: MolRL
one_line_profile: Targeted molecular generation with latent reinforcement learning
detailed_description: MolRL is a tool for generating molecules with specific target properties using latent reinforcement learning. It optimizes molecular structures in a latent space to satisfy desired chemical constraints.

name: EDM
one_line_profile: E(3) Equivariant Diffusion Model for 3D molecule generation
detailed_description: EDM implements an E(3) equivariant diffusion model for generating 3D molecular structures. It ensures that the generated molecules respect rotational and translational symmetries, which is crucial for physical validity.

name: MHC-Diff
one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion model for peptide-MHC structure generation
detailed_description: MHC-Diff is a specialized equivariant diffusion model designed to generate 3D structures of peptide-MHC complexes, aiding in the understanding of immune responses and vaccine design.

name: EcConf
one_line_profile: Ultra-fast equivariant consistency model for molecular conformation
detailed_description: EcConf is a diffusion-based model for generating molecular conformations with high speed and equivariant consistency. It addresses the computational cost of traditional conformation generation methods.

name: EquiCSP
one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion model for crystal structure prediction
detailed_description: EquiCSP applies equivariant diffusion models to the problem of Crystal Structure Prediction (CSP). It generates periodic crystal structures that respect the necessary symmetries and geometric constraints.

name: MolSpectLLM
one_line_profile: Foundation model bridging spectroscopy and molecule generation
detailed_description: MolSpectLLM is a molecular foundation model that integrates spectroscopy data with molecule elucidation and 3D structure generation. It enables the generation of molecular structures directly from spectral data.

name: OMatG
one_line_profile: Generative model for inorganic crystal structure prediction
detailed_description: OMatG is a generative model designed for the de novo generation and prediction of inorganic crystal structures. It aims to discover stable crystal materials by learning from existing crystallographic data.

name: deCIFer
one_line_profile: Crystal structure prediction from powder X-ray diffraction data
detailed_description: deCIFer is a transformer-based model that predicts crystal structures by generating Crystallographic Information Files (CIFs) directly from powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) patterns.

name: GFlowNet
one_line_profile: Generative Flow Networks library for probabilistic modeling
detailed_description: This repository contains the reference implementation of Generative Flow Networks (GFlowNets), a probabilistic framework often used for generating discrete objects like molecular graphs in scientific discovery.

name: Inverse Molecular Design
one_line_profile: Autonomous generator of organic compounds from target properties
detailed_description: This tool serves as an autonomous generator for novel organic compounds, designing molecules that meet specific physicochemical property targets to accelerate materials and drug discovery.

name: JODO
one_line_profile: Joint 2D & 3D diffusion models for molecule generation
detailed_description: JODO implements a framework for learning joint 2D and 3D diffusion models, enabling the generation of complete molecular representations that include both graph topology and 3D geometry.

name: MolFM
one_line_profile: Equivariant flow matching for 3D molecule generation
detailed_description: MolFM implements Equivariant Flow Matching with Hybrid Probability Transport, a method for generating 3D molecular structures that offers advantages over standard diffusion models in terms of sampling efficiency.

name: ED-HNN
one_line_profile: Equivariant Hypergraph Diffusion Neural Operators
detailed_description: ED-HNN implements Equivariant Hypergraph Diffusion Neural Operators, a method for learning on hypergraphs with equivariance properties, applicable to complex scientific data structures.

name: 2D-equivariant-diffusion
one_line_profile: 2D structure generation using equivariant diffusion
detailed_description: This repository provides a generative diffusion model composed of rotationally equivariant Graph Convolutional Layers, designed for generating 2D structures.

name: ProteinReDiff
one_line_profile: Equivariant diffusion model for ligand-binding protein redesign
detailed_description: ProteinReDiff is a complex-based generative model using equivariant diffusion to redesign ligand-binding proteins, facilitating the engineering of proteins with specific binding properties.

name: CVAE for Concrete Design
one_line_profile: Generative model for sustainable concrete material design
detailed_description: This tool uses a Conditional Variational Autoencoder (CVAE) to design environment-friendly concrete mixtures. It predicts compressive strength and environmental impact, aiding in sustainable building material discovery.

name: Paraffin-EG-Model
one_line_profile: Thermal conductivity prediction for paraffin composites
detailed_description: This tool generates paraffin expanded graphite composite structures using the QSGS method and predicts their thermal conductivity using a CNN trained on Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) simulation data.

name: GeoDiffusion
one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
detailed_description: GeoDiffusion is a PyTorch implementation of a geometric diffusion model designed for generating 3D molecular conformations and structures, leveraging geometric deep learning principles.

name: UnityMol
one_line_profile: Molecular visualization and analysis platform
detailed_description: UnityMol is a molecular viewer and analysis tool built on the Unity game engine. It provides high-quality visualization of molecular structures, surfaces, and interactions for structural biology and chemistry.

name: GFMDiff
one_line_profile: Geometric-facilitated denoising diffusion for molecule generation
detailed_description: GFMDiff is a diffusion-based generative model that incorporates geometric information to facilitate the generation of valid and high-quality 3D molecular structures.

name: Uni-Mol3
one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning framework
detailed_description: Uni-Mol3 is a PyTorch implementation of a molecular representation learning framework. It is designed to learn robust representations of molecules for various downstream tasks, including property prediction and generation.

name: HTOCSP
one_line_profile: Automated high-throughput organic crystal structure prediction
detailed_description: HTOCSP is a framework designed for the automated, high-throughput prediction of organic crystal structures. It streamlines the process of generating and evaluating potential crystal packings for organic molecules.

name: ml_conformer_generator
one_line_profile: Shape-constrained molecule generation via equivariant diffusion
detailed_description: This tool generates molecular conformers that satisfy specific shape constraints using a combination of Equivariant Diffusion models and Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN).

name: db-sync
one_line_profile: Synchronization tool for Mergin Maps and PostGIS
detailed_description: db-sync enables two-way synchronization between Mergin Maps (a field data collection tool) and PostGIS databases. It is essential for managing and integrating geospatial data collected in scientific field surveys.

name: geodiff
one_line_profile: Library for handling diffs of geospatial data
detailed_description: geodiff is a library designed to handle differences and changes in geospatial data formats. It supports the version control and management of complex scientific geospatial datasets.

name: GeoDiff
one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for molecular conformation generation
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GeoDiff, a geometric diffusion model designed for generating 3D molecular conformations. It treats the conformation generation as a reverse diffusion process, ensuring rotational and translational invariance.

name: GeoLDM
one_line_profile: Geometric latent diffusion models for 3D molecule generation
detailed_description: Implementation of Geometric Latent Diffusion Models (GeoLDM) for generating 3D molecules. It operates in a latent space to capture geometric features and generate valid molecular structures.

name: SHAARP
one_line_profile: Simulation of optical second harmonic generation from crystal surfaces
detailed_description: An open-source package for deriving and simulating optical second harmonic generation (SHG) response from a single crystal surface. It handles arbitrary symmetry, orientation, and complex refractive indices.

name: WyckoffTransformer
one_line_profile: Generative model for symmetric crystals using Wyckoff positions
detailed_description: A transformer-based model for generating symmetric crystal structures. It leverages Wyckoff positions to ensure crystallographic symmetry in the generated structures.

name: CrySPY
one_line_profile: Automated crystal structure prediction tool
detailed_description: A crystal structure prediction tool that automates the search for stable crystal structures using various algorithms (random search, evolutionary algorithms, Bayesian optimization) coupled with ab initio calculations.

name: xtalmet
one_line_profile: Metrics and distance functions for crystal generation evaluation
detailed_description: A Python package providing distance functions and evaluation metrics specifically designed for assessing the quality and diversity of generated crystal structures.

name: IRDiff
one_line_profile: Interaction-based retrieval-augmented diffusion for protein-specific molecule generation
detailed_description: A diffusion model framework that uses interaction-based retrieval augmentation to generate 3D molecules tailored to specific protein targets.

name: abipy
one_line_profile: Library for analyzing ABINIT results
detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing the results produced by ABINIT, an open-source package for the simulation of the electronic structure of systems.

name: NExT-Mol
one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation combining diffusion and language modeling
detailed_description: Implementation of NExT-Mol, a framework that integrates 3D diffusion models with 1D language modeling for generating 3D molecular structures.

name: MiAD
one_line_profile: Mirage Atom Diffusion for de novo crystal generation
detailed_description: Official implementation of MiAD (Mirage Atom Diffusion), a diffusion-based model for generating crystal structures from scratch.

name: CrystalGAN
one_line_profile: Generative Adversarial Networks for crystal structure discovery
detailed_description: A Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) framework designed to learn and discover new crystallographic structures.

name: Equiformer
one_line_profile: Equivariant Graph Attention Transformer for 3D atomistic graphs
detailed_description: A graph neural network architecture leveraging SE(3) equivariance and attention mechanisms for modeling 3D atomistic systems, useful for property prediction and potential generation.

name: EquiformerV2
one_line_profile: Improved Equivariant Transformer for scaling to higher-degree representations
detailed_description: The second version of Equiformer, offering improved performance and scalability for equivariant graph representation learning on 3D atomistic data.

name: MatSci-LLM-Agents
one_line_profile: Agentic framework for materials science combining LLMs with domain tools
detailed_description: An agent-based framework that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with specific materials science tools to automate tasks such as property extraction, simulation execution, and crystal structure generation.

name: ORGANIC
one_line_profile: Objective-Reinforced Generative Adversarial Networks for Inverse-design Chemistry
detailed_description: An implementation of Objective-Reinforced Generative Adversarial Networks (ORGAN) specifically tailored for the inverse design of chemical structures and materials.

name: MiDi
one_line_profile: Mixed Graph and 3D Denoising Diffusion for Molecule Generation
detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model that jointly generates molecular graphs and their corresponding 3D conformers, utilizing equivariant neural networks.

name: Con-CDVAE
one_line_profile: Conditionally generative model for crystal structures based on CDVAE
detailed_description: A modified version of the Crystal Diffusion Variational Autoencoder (CDVAE) designed for conditional generation of crystal structures based on specific requirements.

name: Pocket2Mol_RL
one_line_profile: Fine-tuning Pocket-conditioned 3D Molecule Generation via Reinforcement Learning
detailed_description: A framework for generating 3D molecules conditioned on protein pockets, utilizing reinforcement learning to fine-tune the generation process for better binding affinity and structural validity.

name: CrystalFormer
one_line_profile: Space Group Informed Transformer for Crystalline Materials Generation
detailed_description: A Transformer-based generative model that incorporates space group constraints to generate valid and stable crystalline material structures.

name: Uni-Mol
one_line_profile: Universal 3D Molecular Representation Learning Framework
detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for 3D molecular representation learning, supporting tasks like molecular property prediction, conformation generation, and pre-training on large-scale datasets.

name: DM2
one_line_profile: Diffusion models for disordered materials generation
detailed_description: A specialized diffusion model implementation designed for generating structures of disordered materials, addressing the unique challenges in modeling non-crystalline systems.

name: DeepCrystal
one_line_profile: Deep Learning Framework for sequence-based Protein Crystallization Prediction
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting the propensity of proteins to crystallize based on their sequence information, aiding in the experimental design of crystallography.

name: RL_materials_generation
one_line_profile: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Inverse Inorganic Materials Design
detailed_description: Code implementation for inverse design of inorganic materials using deep reinforcement learning techniques to optimize material properties.

name: FlowMM
one_line_profile: Riemannian Flow Matching for Material Generation
detailed_description: Implementation of Flow Matching models for generating materials, including FlowMM and FlowLLM, which utilize Riemannian geometry and Large Language Models as base distributions.

name: Equivariant Neural Diffusion
one_line_profile: Equivariant Neural Diffusion for Molecule Generation
detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model that respects E(3) equivariance for generating 3D molecular structures.

name: OM-Diff
one_line_profile: Inverse-design of organometallic catalysts with guided equivariant denoising diffusion
detailed_description: A guided equivariant denoising diffusion model specifically designed for the inverse design of organometallic catalysts.

name: cdvae_xrd
one_line_profile: Deep PXRD Crystallography with CDVAE
detailed_description: An extension of CDVAE applied to Powder X-Ray Diffraction (PXRD) crystallography, enabling structure generation or refinement based on diffraction data.

name: Deep Crystallography
one_line_profile: End-to-End Electron Density Field Generation for Powder Crystallography
detailed_description: A deep learning approach for generating electron density fields directly from powder crystallography data, facilitating structure determination.

name: CNN-based-Inverse-Design
one_line_profile: Inverse design of soft materials via deep-learning-based evolutionary strategy
detailed_description: Code for the inverse design of soft materials using a combination of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and evolutionary strategies.

name: MatFuse
one_line_profile: Controllable Material Generation with Diffusion Models
detailed_description: A diffusion-based framework for controllable generation of materials, allowing for multi-modal conditioning and property-guided synthesis.

name: Active-Generative-Design
one_line_profile: Active generative design of wide bandgap materials
detailed_description: Source code for an active learning framework applied to the generative design of wide bandgap materials, optimizing for specific electronic properties.

name: generative-optim
one_line_profile: Multi-objective optimization in latent space of generative chemistry models
detailed_description: Tools for performing multi- and many-objective optimization within the latent space of generative models for chemistry, aiming to discover molecules with optimal trade-offs.

name: LinkerNet
one_line_profile: Fragment Poses and Linker Co-Design with 3D Equivariant Diffusion
detailed_description: A 3D equivariant diffusion model for the simultaneous design of molecular linkers and fragment poses, useful in fragment-based drug discovery.

name: TargetDiff
one_line_profile: 3D Equivariant Diffusion for Target-Aware Molecule Generation
detailed_description: A target-aware molecule generation model using 3D equivariant diffusion, designed to generate molecules with high affinity to specific protein targets.

name: Robocrystallographer
one_line_profile: Automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions
detailed_description: A tool that generates human-readable text descriptions of crystal structures from standard structure files (e.g., CIF), facilitating analysis and reporting.

name: DomainAdaptation-CGCNN
one_line_profile: Domain adaptation-based Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Network
detailed_description: An implementation of CGCNN enhanced with domain adaptation techniques to improve predictions of experimental band gaps from crystal lattice data.

name: Chemeleon
one_line_profile: Text-guided diffusion model for crystal structure generation
detailed_description: A generative model that uses text descriptions to guide the diffusion-based generation of crystal structures, enabling language-conditioned materials design.

name: Chemeleon-DNG
one_line_profile: Diffusion models for material generation
detailed_description: Supplementary or related implementation of diffusion models for material generation, associated with the Chemeleon project.

name: Chemeleon2
one_line_profile: RL framework for Crystal Structure Generation using GRPO
detailed_description: An advanced framework utilizing Reinforcement Learning (specifically GRPO) for optimizing crystal structure generation.

name: DiffLinker
one_line_profile: Equivariant 3D-Conditional Diffusion Model for Molecular Linker Design
detailed_description: A generative model for designing molecular linkers connecting molecular fragments, using equivariant 3D-conditional diffusion.

name: MatAgent
one_line_profile: Generative framework for interpretable and targeted inorganic materials design
detailed_description: A framework combining diffusion-based generation, property prediction, and LLM-driven reasoning for targeted design of inorganic materials.

name: DiffCSP
one_line_profile: Crystal Structure Prediction by Joint Equivariant Diffusion
detailed_description: A diffusion-based model for crystal structure prediction that jointly generates lattice parameters and atomic coordinates while respecting equivariance.

name: DiffCSP-PP
one_line_profile: Space Group Constrained Crystal Generation
detailed_description: An enhanced version of DiffCSP that incorporates space group constraints to generate physically valid crystal structures.

name: imatgen
one_line_profile: Image-based generative model for inverse design of solid state materials
detailed_description: A generative model that leverages image-based representations for the inverse design of solid-state materials.

name: TGDMat
one_line_profile: Periodic Materials Generation using Text-Guided Joint Diffusion Model
detailed_description: A text-guided joint diffusion model for generating periodic material structures, enabling design based on natural language descriptions.

name: SQUID
one_line_profile: Equivariant Shape-Conditioned Generation of 3D Molecules
detailed_description: A generative model for creating 3D molecules conditioned on specific shapes, utilizing equivariant networks for ligand-based drug design.

name: HierarchicalDesign
one_line_profile: Computational building block approach for multiscale architected materials
detailed_description: A computational framework for the analysis and design of multiscale architected materials, specifically hierarchical metal metamaterials.

name: ChemDASH
one_line_profile: Chemically Directed Atom Swap Hopping for crystal structure prediction
detailed_description: A tool for crystal structure prediction that optimizes structures by swapping atoms in unfavourable chemical environments, developed by the Leverhulme Research Centre.

name: FUSE
one_line_profile: Crystal structure prediction code using evolutionary algorithms
detailed_description: The stable release of FUSE, a code for predicting crystal structures, maintained by the Leverhulme Research Centre for Functional Materials Design.

name: ipcsp
one_line_profile: Integer Programming encoding for Crystal Structure Prediction
detailed_description: A tool that formulates crystal structure prediction as an integer programming problem, featuring bindings for both classic and quantum computing solvers.

name: ddpm-ipa-protein-generation
one_line_profile: Protein structure generation using DDPM and Invariant Point Attention
detailed_description: An implementation of Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) combined with Invariant Point Attention (IPA) for generating protein structures and sequences.

name: equiformer-diffusion
one_line_profile: Equiformer-based diffusion model for protein design
detailed_description: A diffusion model implementation for protein design that leverages Equiformer (SE3/E3 equivariant attention) for improved structural generation.

name: equiformer-pytorch
one_line_profile: SE3/E3 equivariant attention network implementation
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Equiformer, an SE3/E3 equivariant transformer architecture used as a backbone for various molecular and protein generation tasks.

name: LatticeWorks
one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for functionally graded lattice generation
detailed_description: A toolbox for generating functionally graded lattice structures in various configurations, useful for mechanical engineering and materials design.

name: jds6600_python

name: UC2-Hi2

detailed_description: Tools and scripts to control a GRBL-based Arduino Shield for automated multiwell plate imaging using the openUC2 microscope platform.

name: slave

name: pcdsdevices

detailed_description: A collection of Ophyd device subclasses specifically designed for the Photon Controls and Data Systems (PCDS) at the LCLS synchrotron facility.

name: typhos

detailed_description: A tool for automatically generating customizable Graphical User Interfaces for Ophyd-based scientific devices, used in synchrotron control systems.

name: prpy
